metas.name: Sherlock
metas.description: A modern take on a classic detective, filled with mystery and drama, aligning with your crime and mystery interests.

metas.name: The Queen's Gambit
metas.description: A compelling drama with strong character development and a captivating story, similar to dramas you've enjoyed.

metas.name: Black Mirror
metas.description: Dystopian science fiction anthology exploring dark themes, mirroring your enjoyment of 'Love, Death & Robots' and other sci-fi shows.

metas.name: Parks and Recreation
metas.description: A feel-good comedy with an ensemble cast and witty writing, similar to 'Scrubs' and 'Ted Lasso'

metas.name: Arrested Development
metas.description: Cult comedy with quirky characters and clever writing, like 'It's Always Sunny in Philadelphia' and 'Goodness Gracious Me'

metas.name: The IT Crowd
metas.description: British sitcom with absurd humor and relatable characters, fitting with your comedy preferences.

metas.name: Peep Show
metas.description: Darkly comedic British sitcom with a unique perspective, similar to 'Brassic' and other British comedies.

metas.name: Brooklyn Nine-Nine
metas.description: Police procedural comedy with a strong ensemble cast, blending humor and heartwarming moments.

metas.name: Bojack Horseman
metas.description: Animated comedy with dark humor and complex characters, like 'Rick and Morty' but with more emotional depth.

metas.name: Archer
metas.description: Animated spy comedy with witty dialogue and absurd situations, catering to your animation and comedy interests.

metas.name: Gravity Falls
metas.description: Animated mystery adventure with clever storytelling and engaging characters, suitable if you enjoyed 'The Simpsons' and are looking for well-made animation.

metas.name: Avatar: The Last Airbender
metas.description: Animated fantasy series with great world building, action, and character development; similar to 'One-Punch Man' but with a deeper story.

metas.name: Attack on Titan
metas.description: Dark and thrilling anime with intense action and a complex plot, appealing to your interest in action and adventure anime.

metas.name: Dark
metas.description: Mind-bending German sci-fi mystery with time travel and complex relationships, akin to 'Stranger Things' and 'Foundation' but with a darker tone.

metas.name: Westworld
metas.description: Sci-fi western with philosophical themes and thrilling action, matching your interest in sci-fi and drama.

metas.name: The Expanse
metas.description: Hard sci-fi series with political intrigue and compelling characters, expanding on your 'Foundation' and 'Fallout' interests.

metas.name: Altered Carbon
metas.description: Cyberpunk sci-fi with a gritty atmosphere and intense action, complementing your 'Fallout' and 'Love, Death & Robots' viewing.

metas.name: Counterpart
metas.description: Spy thriller with a sci-fi twist involving parallel universes, blending drama and intrigue like 'The Night Manager' but with added sci-fi elements.

metas.name: Fargo
metas.description: Anthology crime drama with dark humor and compelling characters, fitting your drama, crime, and mystery preferences.

metas.name: Mindhunter
metas.description: Crime drama focusing on the early days of criminal profiling, appealing to your interest in crime and mystery shows.

metas.name: Line of Duty
metas.description: British police procedural with complex plots and morally ambiguous characters, in line with your crime and drama preferences.

metas.name: Bodyguard
metas.description: Intense thriller with political intrigue and action, similar to 'The Night Manager' but with a faster pace.

metas.name: The Americans
metas.description: Spy drama with complex characters and compelling storylines, aligning with your interest in drama and espionage.

metas.name: Mr. Robot
metas.description: Psychological thriller with a focus on hacking and social commentary, featuring complex themes and unreliable narration.

metas.name: Russian Doll
metas.description: Comedy-drama with a time-looping premise and dark humor, similar to the sci-fi elements of 'Love, Death & Robots' mixed with comedic undertones.

metas.name: Upload
metas.description: Sci-fi comedy with a unique premise about the afterlife in a digital world, blending humor and sci-fi themes.

metas.name: What We Do in the Shadows
metas.description: Comedy mockumentary about vampire roommates, offering absurd humor and a unique perspective.

metas.name: Reservation Dogs
metas.description: Comedy-drama about Indigenous teenagers coming of age in rural Oklahoma, balancing humor and heartfelt moments.

metas.name: Better Things
metas.description: Comedy-drama about a single mother and actress navigating life in Los Angeles, with a realistic and relatable tone.

metas.name: Catastrophe
metas.description: British comedy about an unexpected pregnancy and the subsequent relationship, offering sharp wit and relatable characters.

metas.name: After Life
metas.description: Dark comedy-drama about a man dealing with grief after the death of his wife, offering both humor and emotional depth.

metas.name: The Good Place
metas.description: Comedy series with a philosophical twist about the afterlife and what it means to be a good person, combining humor with thought-provoking themes.

metas.name: The Detectorists
metas.description: Gentle and charming British comedy about two metal detecting enthusiasts, known for its heartwarming characters and beautiful cinematography.

metas.name: Fleabag
metas.description: British comedy-drama known for its sharp wit, dark humor, and emotional depth, centered around a complex and relatable character.

metas.name: Ozark
metas.description: Crime drama about a financial advisor who gets involved with a drug cartel, similar to 'Brassic' in its crime elements but with a more serious tone.

metas.name: Severance
metas.description: Dystopian thriller about employees with surgically divided work and personal lives, combining sci-fi elements with suspenseful storytelling.

metas.name: Slow Horses
metas.description: Spy thriller with dark humor about a group of MI5 rejects, blending espionage with witty writing and compelling characters.

metas.name: Babylon Berlin
metas.description: German neo-noir drama set in 1920s Berlin, combining historical intrigue with crime and mystery elements.

metas.name: Station Eleven
metas.description: Post-apocalyptic drama about a traveling symphony in a world ravaged by a flu pandemic, offering a hopeful and character-driven story.

metas.name: Undone
metas.description: Animated comedy-drama with a unique rotoscoping animation style, exploring themes of mental health and identity through a time-bending narrative.
